title: PBE Acceptance
body:
Just Wondering What I should do about this,
I got an acceptance letter supposedly to start a PBE Account.
The E-mail is as follows leagueoflegends@email.riotgames.com
Telling me i've been accepted as a tester but when I click the link,
It brings me too the league of legends page where my application was, stating it is still pending.
Is this a scam or a legit riot e-mail? And if it's legit, is this a bug that I can't create an account?

Thanks In Advance!
~ Deathgun12

replies.body:
Hey DeathGun12,

This is legitimate. We had an issue where players couldn't create an account yesterday. This issue was resolved last night, so you should be able to create an account without any issues. If you're still unable to do so, let me know! :]
This happened to me too, I sent a support ticket, hope something happens.
Yes I gotteeeem :D I'm kinda hyped
Woke up this morning and it worked. Probably just because of everyone trying at the same time last night.

I got the Same thing, Was really excited that I finally got accepted and then it took me to a log in. I continued to tog in and it said your application has been received, You've successfully added your name to the pool of candidates. Bla Bla Bla, I don't need to repeat the rest. I received my Email today 10/29/15.
How long ago did you guys get the email? Days? hours? less?
This just happened to me too and I hope I get to create a PBE account right away cuz I'm excited.
quite possible i had the same happen to me. this isnt a small issue, just set it up in the morning i guess.
I got two emails from them and I think the severs might be down because of all the people trying to sign up at once. That's just a guess but who knows.
